The photograph was taken by British phot: whose watermark is visible in the image. Soden confirmed that the photograph actually shows an abandoned factory that had housed the development of jet engines.
The backstory commonly attached to the p: claiming that it shows an abandoned military base where something escaped from the experimentation room, is a work of fiction.
Soden: s description of her photography focuses on exploring the boundaries of beauty, decay, nostalgia, and neglect in various abandoned locations, including derelict asylums, closed schools, ex-military compounds, and city power stations.
The photograph has been circulating on v: such as iFunny and Memedroid, but its authenticity as a genuine photograph is confirmed.
